title: G-Dragon of Boy Band Big Bang Completes Military Service
text:
G-Dragon of boy band Big Bang was discharged from his mandatory military service last week.

He thanked his fans, who gathered to see him at a military unit in Yongin, Gyeonggi Province on Saturday.

"I want to thank all my fans who have been waiting for me, and also for coming here today to greet me," G-Dragon said.

"Now I'm going to pick up where I left off and do my best," he added.

In a testament to his enduring popularity, more than 3,000 fans from home and abroad gathered early in the morning to catch a glimpse of him.
description: G-Dragon of Boy Band Big Bang Completes Military Service
